name: CreatePaymentType
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `PaymentTypes:Create`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: JSON
request_samples.sample:
{
  "AutoFinalizeOnOrderPaid": true,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "BackendRelationID": "string",
  "CashJournalMethod": 1,
  "Category": 3,
  "Code": "string",
  "IsActive": true,
  "LedgerClassID": "string",
  "Name": "string",
  "Options": {
    "BlockOverPayments": true,
    "CanBeCancelled": true,
    "CanBeRefunded": true,
    "CanBeUsedForPayments": true,
    "CanRefundWithoutOriginalPaymentTransaction": true,
    "GiftCardConfigurationID": 123,
    "LoyaltyProgramID": 123,
    "OnlyAvailableInLocalMode": true,
    "Pending": true,
    "PinHandler": "string",
    "RefundPending": true,
    "RequiredFunctionality": "string",
    "RequiredFunctionalityScope": 1,
    "RequiredUserType": 4,
    "RequiresAmount": true,
    "RequiresConfirmationForPayments": true,
    "RequiresConfirmationForRefunds": true,
    "RequiresInteractionForRefunds": true
  },
  "PaymentMethodID": 123,
  "PrintOnDocuments": true,
  "ReturnAction": 1,
  "Roles": [
    {
      "RoleID": 123
    }
  ],
  "ScriptID": 123
}

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AutoFinalizeOnOrderPaid": true,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "BackendRelationID": "string",
  "CashJournalMethod": 1,
  "Category": 3,
  "Code": "string",
  "IsActive": true,
  "LedgerClassID": "string",
  "Name": "string",
  "Options": {
    "BlockOverPayments": true,
    "CanBeCancelled": true,
    "CanBeRefunded": true,
    "CanBeUsedForPayments": true,
    "CanRefundWithoutOriginalPaymentTransaction": true,
    "GiftCardConfigurationID": 123,
    "LoyaltyProgramID": 123,
    "OnlyAvailableInLocalMode": true,
    "Pending": true,
    "PinHandler": "string",
    "RefundPending": true,
    "RequiredFunctionality": "string",
    "RequiredFunctionalityScope": 1,
    "RequiredUserType": 4,
    "RequiresAmount": true,
    "RequiresConfirmationForPayments": true,
    "RequiresConfirmationForRefunds": true,
    "RequiresInteractionForRefunds": true
  },
  "PaymentMethodID": 123,
  "PrintOnDocuments": true,
  "ReturnAction": 1,
  "Roles": [
    {
      "RoleID": 123
    }
  ],
  "ScriptID": 123
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/CreatePaymentType

C.name: CanBeUsedForPayments
C.description: Setting this to false results in refund only, will therefor only work with CanBeRefunded:true and CanRefundWithoutOriginalPaymentTransaction:true

C.name: GiftCardConfigurationID
C.description: This is the ID of a `GiftCardConfiguration`

C.name: LoyaltyProgramID
C.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgram`

C.name: RequiredFunctionalityScope
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Create
* `2` - Edit
* `4` - Delete
* `8` - View
* `31` - Manage
* `32` - Settings
* `64` - Scripting
* `127` - All

C.name: RequiredUserType
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Employee
* `2` - Customer
* `4` - Anonymous
* `8` - Business
* `17` - System
* `64` - Debtor
* `256` - LimitedTrust
* `512` - Tester
* `1024` - RemovedByRequest
* `2048` - Api
* `4096` - Impersonated

D.name: RoleID
D.description: This is the ID of a `Role`

B.name: CashJournalMethod
B.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Close
* `2` - OpenAndClose
* `3` - Ignore

B.name: Category
B.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Other
* `1` - Debit
* `2` - Credit
* `3` - Cash
* `4` - Voucher
* `5` - Online
* `6` - Rounding
* `7` - Exchange

B.name: LedgerClassID
B.description: This is the ID of a `LedgerClass`

B.name: PaymentMethodID
B.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentMethod`

B.name: ScriptID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Script`

F.name: Code
F.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

F.name: Message
F.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

F.name: RequestID
F.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

F.name: Type
F.description: A short description of the error type.

G.name: ExternalIDs
G.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

G.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
G.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

G.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
G.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

E.name: ID
E.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentType`
